parameters.name: VertexId
parameters.description: ID of the vertex from which you want to return the normal information

title: ITessellation.GetVertexNormal
description: Gets the information that describes the normal direction corresponding to vertex.

parameters.name: VertexId
parameters.description: ID of the vertex from which you want to return the normal information

returns: Array of 3 doubles describing the normal vector direction of this vertex corresponding to the face to which it belongs
